document_data.name: Dornal Whitebeard
document_data.occupation: fighter/rogue{{Cite adventurers league/Breath of the Yellow Rose|7}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Dornal Whitebeard''' was an agent of the [[Lords' Alliance]] in the [[Moonsea]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Dornal was a gregarious old [[dwarf]] with a hedonistic demeanor. He enjoyed the finer things in life and always smiled.{{Cite adventurers league/Eye of the Tempest|7}}
document_data.History:
Dornal born in a wealthy family of [[Waterdeep]] but soon he left in search of adventures.{{Cite adventurers league/Reclamation of Phlan|119}}

Dornal was possibly involved in the case of [[dracolich]]es and [[ghost ship]]s roaming the [[Moonsea]]. He said that the Alliance's main concern was that the merchant [[Gilfron Milon]] should arrive safely in [[Phlan]].{{Cite adventurers league/Shadows over the Moonsea|11}} Around [[1489 DR]], Dornal escaped Phlan on the ''[[Gilded Trophy]]'' when the city fell to [[Vorgansharax]].{{Cite adventurers league/Tyranny in Phlan|25}} In [[1491 DR]], he resurfaced in [[Mulmaster]] asking to the adventurers to investigate about the disappearance of a girl, daughter of Zor [[Serge Affapanov]], a Lords' Alliance possible ally in predicate to enter in the Blades soon. Later together with Zor [[Garwyl Gos]] hired an adventuring party to instigate a mysterious storm scorching the [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]].
